meanings.definition: A person who sings exceptionally well.
meanings.sent1: The supersingers at the concert amazed the audience with their beautiful voices.
meanings.sent2: I love listening to supersingers like Adele and Beyoncé.
meanings.sent3: The supersingers in the choir made the birds outside jealous!
meanings.sent4: Her voice was like that of a supersinger, hitting every note perfectly.
meanings.sent5: The supersingers' harmonies blended together like a colorful painting.

meanings.definition: The act of singing exceptionally well.
meanings.sent1: Her supersingers during the performance left everyone in awe.
meanings.sent2: Supersingers require practice and dedication to achieve.
meanings.sent3: The cat's meow sounded like supersingers in a tiny choir.
meanings.sent4: The wind carried the supersingers of the forest through the trees.
meanings.sent5: The supersingers of the opera filled the hall with their powerful voices.

meanings.definition: The group of singers who perform exceptionally well.
meanings.sent1: The supersingers in the band always steal the show.
meanings.sent2: The competition featured many talented supersingers from around the world.
meanings.sent3: The supersingers in the school choir practiced every day to perfect their harmonies.
meanings.sent4: The supersingers on stage shone brightly under the spotlight.
meanings.sent5: The supersingers' voices blended together like a sweet melody.
